topRule.fieldDescription: Add Top Horizontal Rule above content
topRule.name: ./topRule

bottomRule.fieldDescription: Add Bottom Horizontal Rule below content
bottomRule.name: ./bottomRule

ruleColor.fieldDescription: Color affects top and bottom horizontal rules, if enabled
ruleColor.name: ./ruleColor

topMargin.fieldDescription: Add standard Top margin for the component
topMargin.name: ./topMargin

bottomMargin.fieldDescription: Add standard Bottom margin for the component
bottomMargin.name: ./bottomMargin

imagePath.fieldDescription: Recommended Image sizes (width): 2 column 130px; 3 column 210px, 4 column 290px. Image files should be 512KB maximum.
imagePath.name: ./imagePath

decorative.fieldDescription: Check if the image should be ignored by assistive technology and therefore does not require an alternative text. This applies to decorative images only.
decorative.name: ./decorative

imagePlacement.fieldDescription: On mobile and within Column Control, the image will only appear above/below text. Right =Below; Left=Above
imagePlacement.name: ./imagePlacement

targetUrl.fieldDescription: Internal page (or) external URL that needs to be redirected upon button click. Please mention http/https by domain for external Link.
targetUrl.name: ./targetUrl

targetUrlNewWindow.name: ./targetUrlNewWindow
targetUrlNewWindow.text: Open Target URL in new window?

telePhoneNumber.fieldDescription: Enter phone number using numbers only (no special characters)
telePhoneNumber.name: ./telePhoneNumber

buttonPlacement.fieldDescription: Option to align button when Image is above or below
buttonPlacement.name: ./buttonPlacement
